Is there an `IOBuffer`-like thing that can make `readline` wait?
```julia> iob = IOBuffer()
IOBuffer(data=UInt8[...], readable=true, writable=true, seekable=true, append=false, size=0, maxsize=Inf, ptr=1, mark=-1)

julia> readline(iob)
"" # returns immediately

julia> readline(stdin)
 # waits for data```
